Detailed Description

Implementation of the negative Kernel Target Alignment (KTA) as proposed by Nello Cristianini.

double negativeKTA::errorDerivative ( Model &  model,
const Array< double > &  input,
const Array< double > &  target,
Array< double > &  derivative 
) [inline, virtual]

Computes the negative Kernel Target Alignment between the target and the kernel function output on the input.

The partial derivatives of the negative KTA w.r.t. the model parameters are returned in the derivative parameter.

Reimplemented from ErrorFunction.
